RelatedSentence: Expectations that the Bank of England will intervene next month to cool the housing market have surfaced as some of the world 's other major central banks have taken similar action .
Earlier this month , Sweden 's regulators made it more expensive for lenders to issue mortgages by increasing the amount of loss - absorbing capital they must hold against home loans .
